name: Peach Scones
description: Sweet, tender, and moist vegan Peach Scones with vanilla glaze are a fruit lover’s dream! They are the perfect scone to make when peaches are in season.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup peeled and diced fresh peaches

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper (or spray pan with non-stick spray.)
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper (or spray pan with non-stick spray.)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, sugar and cinnamon.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, sugar and cinnamon.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cold vegan butter, and use a pastry cutter or your hands to work the butter into the dry ingredients. It should resemble coarse crumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cold vegan butter, and use a pastry cutter or your hands to work the butter into the dry ingredients. It should resemble coarse crumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the milk and vanilla, and stir until just combined. It will still be a shaggy dough at this point. Fold in the diced peaches and candied ginger, if using, gently. The dough will become a bit wet; that's okay. Use your hands if needed to get the peaches and ginger incorporated the best you can.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the milk and vanilla, and stir until just combined. It will still be a shaggy dough at this point. Fold in the diced peaches and candied ginger, if using, gently. The dough will become a bit wet; that's okay. Use your hands if needed to get the peaches and ginger incorporated the best you can.

recipeInstructions.text: On a lightly floured surface, knead the dough a few times until it comes together, gently. Flatten the dough with your hands (lightly flour your hands if sticky). Flatten it into a circle, about 1 inch thick.
recipeInstructions.name: On a lightly floured surface, knead the dough a few times until it comes together, gently. Flatten the dough with your hands (lightly flour your hands if sticky). Flatten it into a circle, about 1 inch thick.

recipeInstructions.text: Using a pizza cutter or large knife, cut it like you would a pizza, into 8 pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Using a pizza cutter or large knife, cut it like you would a pizza, into 8 pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Using a spatula, place the scones onto the prepared baking sheet and bake for 20-24 minutes, until lightly golden brown on top. Transfer to a wire cooling rack.
recipeInstructions.name: Using a spatula, place the scones onto the prepared baking sheet and bake for 20-24 minutes, until lightly golden brown on top. Transfer to a wire cooling rack.

recipeInstructions.text: While the scones are cooling, make the glaze. In a small bowl, whisk together the powdered sugar, soy milk and vanilla until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: While the scones are cooling, make the glaze. In a small bowl, whisk together the powdered sugar, soy milk and vanilla until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the scones have cooled, drizzle with the glaze and serve. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Once the scones have cooled, drizzle with the glaze and serve. Enjoy!
